com.github.valid8j.pcond.validator

Interface ExceptionComposer.Base

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ExceptionComposer.ForEnsure, ExceptionComposer.ForRequire, ExceptionComposer.ForValidate
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExceptionComposer.ForEnsure.Default, ExceptionComposer.ForRequire.Default, ExceptionComposer.ForValidate.Default
    Enclosing interface:
    ExceptionComposer

    public static interface ExceptionComposer.Base

    An interface that defines common methods that an object returned by each method in the ExceptionComposer has.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Throwable exceptionForGeneralViolation(String message)
      A method to compose an exception for a general violation.
      default Throwable exceptionForIllegalState(String message)
      A method to compose an exception for a "State-violation".
      default Throwable exceptionForNonNullViolation(String message)
      A method to compose an exception for a "Null-violation".

    • Method Detail

      • exceptionForNonNullViolation

        default Throwable exceptionForNonNullViolation(String message)

        A method to compose an exception for a "Null-violation". When you are checking a "pre-condition", if the value must not be null, you may prefer a NullPointerException, rather than an exception such as YourPreconditionException as Google Guava’s Precondition does so.

        This method by default, returns a NullPointerException.

        In case you prefer to throw YourPreconditionException for the sake of uniformity, you can override this method for an object returned by ExceptionComposer.forRequire()

        For more detail, please refer to Validator.Configuration.

        Parameters:
        message - A message attached to the composed exception.
        Returns:
        A composed exception.

      • exceptionForIllegalState

        default Throwable exceptionForIllegalState(String message)

        A method to compose an exception for a "State-violation".

        Parameters:
        message - A message attached to the composed exception.
        Returns:
        A composed exception.
        See Also:
        exceptionForNonNullViolation(String)

      • exceptionForGeneralViolation

        Throwable exceptionForGeneralViolation(String message)

        A method to compose an exception for a general violation. An extension-point to customize the exception to be thrown for a certain context.

        Parameters:
        message - A message attached to the composed exception.
        Returns:
        A composed exception.
